Uses of Class
eu.ciechanowiec.conditional.Conditional

    • Uses of Conditional in eu.ciechanowiec.conditional

      Methods in eu.ciechanowiec.conditional that return Conditional 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static Conditional Conditional.conditional​(boolean describedValue)
      Returns a new instance of a Conditional that describes the passed boolean value (true or false).
      Conditional Conditional.discardActionsOnFalse()
      Removes all actions submitted to this conditional and bound to a false value.
      Conditional Conditional.discardActionsOnTrue()
      Removes all actions submitted to this conditional and bound to a true value.
      Conditional Conditional.discardAllActions()
      Removes all actions submitted to this conditional.
      Conditional Conditional.execute()
      Executes all submitted actions, bound to the value described by this conditional.
      Conditional Conditional.execute​(int cyclesToExecute)
      Executes the specified amount of cycles all submitted actions, bound to the value described by this conditional.
      <T> Conditional Conditional.onFalse​(Action<T> actionOnFalse)
      Submits an action to this conditional and bounds it to a false value.
      Conditional Conditional.onFalse​(Runnable actionOnFalse)
      Submits an action to this conditional and bounds it to a false value.
      <T> Conditional Conditional.onFalse​(Callable<T> actionOnFalse)
      Submits an action to this conditional and bounds it to a false value.
      <T extends Exception>
      Conditional      		 Conditional.onFalseThrow​(T exceptionToThrow)
      Submits an action to this conditional that throws the passed Exception wrapped into an unchecked WrapperException.
      <T> Conditional Conditional.onTrue​(Action<T> actionOnTrue)
      Submits an action to this conditional and bounds it to a true value.
      Conditional Conditional.onTrue​(Runnable actionOnTrue)
      Submits an action to this conditional and bounds it to a true value.
      <T> Conditional Conditional.onTrue​(Callable<T> actionOnTrue)
      Submits an action to this conditional and bounds it to a true value.
      <T extends Exception>
      Conditional      		 Conditional.onTrueThrow​(T exceptionToThrow)
      Submits an action to this conditional that throws the passed Exception wrapped into an unchecked WrapperException.
